description: Big or small, one strongly influenced to commit evil can be capable of anything. So learns Inuyasha and crew when a demon parasite attaches itself to little Shippou.

titles.title: Nuestro peor enemigo, Shippo poseído por un Parásito Crisálida
O maior dos inimigo; Pupa parasita de Shippou
Possessed by a Parasite: Shippo, Our Worst Enemy
Unser stärkster Feind – Shippo und die Parasitenpuppe
最強の敵 宿り蛹七宝
